main event: Multiple objects were sighted 26 miles southeast of Hess airfield, near Cold Springs, N.Y., exhibiting a v-shaped flight pattern and zigzagging before making a 360-degree turn and disappearing without leaving a trace.
interesting points: The sighting occurred between 1400 and 1500 hours on December 7, 1958., The objects were described as 22 feet long and gold in color., The objects exhibited unusual flight characteristics such as zigzagging and making abrupt turns., The report includes a mention of a high-pitched sound associated with the sighted objects., There are no photographs included in the report.
sighted object: Objects exhibiting a v-shaped flight pattern
witness description: Individual witness reported observing the objects.
